title: Mahomes Is Human, the London Raiders, McCaffrey’s MVP Campaign, and Week 5 Reactions | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Chiefs scored the fewest points ever under Patrick Mahomes in a loss to the Colts (0:40), Christian McCaffrey is setting records through five weeks, and Jon Gruden’s Raiders hold off the Bears in London and move to 3-2. Plus: The Packers' handling of the Cowboys in Dallas (10:20), the Chargers' loss, our challenge flags, and tomorrow's headlines (27:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
